name: Naeco
description:
Collect all the different kinds of wastes from the ocean with your Drone Powered Net before your time runs out! 

Your actions will benefit the environment and biodiversity – not to mention you can exchange your points for upgrades to help your work too! 

If you ever feel like you need a well earned rest, just open your journal and discover interesting facts of the animals you just saw! 

So, what are you waiting for?!
